column4: France suffers from the explosion and destruction of the ``Super Pheonix'' reactor

Renewed hostilities between Mohawk nation and Quebec.
MIT scientists produce crude cybernetic machine-brain interface. Yes-No level of clarity at low percentages possible.
Low Temperature Superconductor (214\degree K) discovered by An Tsien
Null Clock Logic is demonstrated as a alternative logic for computation hardware.

Blood factor used by fish for surviving temperatures below freezing is isolated.
South American University of Ecological Engineering (SAUEE) established in Costa Rica

Anti-Fission Referendum Approved in the USA
Johannesburg established as only legal residence for whites in South Africa.

US Goes metric.

NYC asks UN to vacate

A 60% fatality rate encephalitis strikes throughout most of Asia major.

Quebec Food riots

Guiseppe Lapolito demonstrates powered armor by walking into Pentagon uninvited.

screen shuttle service between Moscow  New York  Antartica  and Tycho Brachae.

column4: 1st Gauss-Jam Drive demonstrated in an interstellar probe.

Montreal massacre 1 534 dead.
Mahan and Kamal demonstrate the first basic deciphering of nerve signals sent by a frog's eye.
Sandoz starts marketing male and female contraceptive implants based on non-abusive hormal regulation.

First genetically-tampered human born. All records of experiment are lost in post announcement riot and fire.
Mitsubishi unveils first commercially obtainable shuttle craft  the Infiniti-2.

Creation of Ares city on Mars.

Netrunning using cybernetic plug-ins becomes more common.

Korea invades China.
Korea makes China a Protecterate.

The L.A. Quake of '56. Richter 9.3.
First commercial Organ bank is opened up.
"Luddite" movement begins to take power.
ZPG Act : Enforcement of birth limits by the Dept of Public Health. (Was Bureau of Mental health).

Korea and its protectorate becomes a hereditary aristocracy.
Basic directional cyberlink is demonstrated. The beginning of true VR netrunning.
First Human (Andrea Garelick) surives being flash frozen.

Anti-laser aerosols come into common military use.
In isolated  laboratory conditions on Luna  a crude "nano-machine" is constructed.

Australian scientist Bob Levecki creates prototype "fusion drive"
Graviton Laser concept validated. No practical application foreseen.
MARS Science Labs produces 3rd generation cyberlinks for its pilots and gunners. Requires training and drugs
Ass'n of 1st Korean Emperor

UN lifts ban on cybernetic augmentation.

2112/1/11,0,Lunar Independence,Lunar Independence
2115/1/1,3,Military Gravity Gen,2nd generation gravity generators produced on Io Station.
2116/10/11,4,Empathy Induction, Warner Labs demonstrates induction of rage in a chimpanzee.
2121/1/1,1,Beef and Bread War,Citing unpaid debts Argentina invades Chile against opposition from NorAm and Chilean troops.
2121/1/1,3,3rd gen Powered Armor,Demos Construction outputs 3rd generation powered armor. with Directional Cyberlink.
2122/8/9,4,Antigathic Field, Fionna McIntosh demonstrates the use of a modified Ab Field to slow the aging process.
2123/1/1,2,Costa Rican Conservancy acquires Panama and Nicaragua. ,Costa Rican Conservancy acquires Panama and Nicaragua. 
2124/4/12,1,Belmopan Armistice, Chile Aergentinian war ends with Belmopan Armistice 
2125/1/1,2,Mexico attempts to invade Gautemala.,Mexico attempts to invade Gautemala. NorAm funded Mexican forces are defeated in less than 6 months 
2125/1/1,2,NorAm Combine leaves UN,The NorAm Combine withdraws from the U.N. 
2130/1/1,2,Artifacts used in off-planet mining ,First use of artifacts in mining operations off terra
2131/1/1,1,Creation of the Conservancy, The region is renamed the Conservancy States.
2133/1/1,3,3rd Generation Agrav,Fusion Propulsion Laboratories(FPL) puts out 3rd generation artificial gravity platform.  
2134/1/1,3,Nono-Manufacture ,Expensive and slow but effective nano-technology engineering allows for a whole new set of materials. Requires 0-G environment.
2136/1/1,0,First Contact,1st contact between Gauss jammer Einstein and Alpha Centauran manned probe Fir'A'Naun. 
2138/2/11,4,Transition Drive ,Discovery of Mak'kasonar (Alphan) and Cagson (Terran) transition 
2138/5/1,2,Alphan Return,Arrival on Alpha of Transition Drive equipped Pinnance carrying Mak'kasonor.
2138/12/1,2,Terran Return,Arrival on Terra of Transition Drive equipped Pinnance carrying Eli Cagson and his two sons.
2139/2/16,2,Transition Drive made Public,Transition Drive is put in the public domain by executive decree.
2139/1/1,4,Inertial damping Field,Inertial Dampening Field invented by Judy McInnes based on Alphan spatial mathematics.
2139/12/4,4,FTL Comm,Short-range (interplanetary) FTL communication becomes possible through directed tachyon pulses.
2139/4/1,2,Return of Einstein,Return of Einstein  to terra.
2139/7/1,3,Bacterial Augmentation,Production of bacterial augmentation sera for terran troops.
2140/1/1,0,Diaspora,Ships begin exploring and spreading out through Transition Points.  Colonizations begin. 340 Colony ships leave in 15 years.
2141/1/1,4, ,First successful bacterial augmentation occurs in secret corporate lab.
2143/1/1,2,Liberation and rediscovery of the planet Elysia,Liberation and rediscovery of the planet Elysia
2144/7/7,2,Rediscoveryy of Coven, The Wicca colonised planet of Coven is ''rediscovered''.
2155/1/1,4,Transom Transform Force Screen ,Massive advances in field theory make the Transom Force Screen possible.  
2177/1/1,2,Ship Mounted Force Screens,Ship-mounted Force Screens implemeted by Hokaido Ship Yards.
2179/1/1,4,Tachyon-Net Sensors,Tachyon-net sensors developed by Lowell Dayton.

Nano-bots make possible organic-metal composites.
Spun Silico-Metallic weave is created.
A new element is dicovered.
2nd generation Force Screens invented.
Karban 541 born on planet Elysia.
First test of cloaking effects using shields on ships. No pieces found.
Matter Energy relationship characterised.

Formation of Alphan.Terran Coalition(ATC).
Production of first military artificial factor humanoid artifact for combat in proximan space.
Major James F. Urlich of the Israeli Defense Force forms a first-strike  mobile  armored  marine unit.
Paul Stedman Hodge creates Micro-Gravity-Generators(MGGs).
Organic metals become cheaper to create.
1st generation fusion batteries put into production.
Dr. Lisa Randall's team incorporates new fusion batteries into new "Mauler" mech suit design.
On November 18th the Mechanized Infantry of the ATC are created.
MI troops first see action. "Iron Fist" division is successful and is decimated in first action.
2nd generation bacterial augmentation fully stabilized.  Boosted troops start to appear.
3rd generation Force Screens appear on ATC ships.
Elysia discovered and freed.
The battle of Terragoth ends the Tri-Culture War with the defeat of the Proximans.
On November 11th  in orbit around Alpha Prime  The CONFEDERATION is born.
The Elysian Council of Elders votes Trocia 12 to represent them on the Confed Council
AI technology makes a huge leap in a Confed lab in New Mexico.
Senate votes to reduce MI strength.

column3: Marion Sutaken becomes General of the MI

MI put down revolt on Antares 4.

Organic Metal components become standard on MI suits.
Solange Mithra discovers the first matter transmission relay.
Ion Interplanetary Drive replaces advanced Fusion Drive in modern ships.

Marion Sutaken becomes Commander General of all Confed forces
Stealth suit invented by Dominique Ratton of New Holland.
Trocia 12 retires  and Mora 641 replaces her in  the Confed Council.
Pulhar system rebels.  MI Division sent in.Constitutional Government restored.
Team of scientists invent the WARP torpedo.  (uses transition effect implosion)
